title: The true vse of armorie shewed by historie, and plainly proued by example: the necessitie therof also discouered: with the maner of differings in ancient time, the lawfulnes of honorable funerals and moniments: with other matters of antiquitie, incident to the aduauncing of banners, ensignes, and marks of noblenesse and cheualrie, by William Wyrley.
author: Wyrley, William, 1565-1618.
publicationStmtPublisher: By I. Iackson, for Gabriell Cawood,
